transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Sir lekin 9 baje se late gadi mat karna aap na.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: To please kijiye aap bahut jyada latka rahe ho matlab aise.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ye mai Shivani baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hanji mam.
Executive: Ha actually mam maine isliye call kiya tha kyuki abhi na mere se CST tester pe wo recording line mang rahe the. To just maine uske liye hi call kiya tha aapko. Koi baat nahi agar aapke pass abhi nahi hai to aap ek kaam karo mai aapko bata deti hu kyuki yaha pe mere se ticket bhi update mang rahe hai ki aapne abhi tak ticket close kyu nahi kara matlab issue resolve kyu nahi hua to uske liye. To abhi aap ek kaam kar deti hu jo leads vagera ka issues hai wo to maine ticket ke liye open karwa dungi abhi Vasundhara mam se dobara se. To jaise hi wo recording aap bana lo na aap mujhe whatsapp me coordinate karke share kar dena. Thik hai? Definitely mam mai khud karungi.
Customer: Ha kyuki mam humne jyada time tak ticket bhi rakh nahi sakte aise. To abhi mai aapka ye ticket close kar deti hu jab bhi aap recording bana ke bhej doge aap mujhe whatsapp pe coordinate kar dena mai turant Vasundhara mam ke hath me bhej dungi.
Customer: Jaisa thik lage mam.
Executive: To abhi mai ticket close kar deti hu thik hai mam?
Customer: Matlab mam mujhe nahi pata kyuki aap log itna manipulate kar rahe ho mujhe chize samajh se bahar ho rahi hai ab kyuki ye to obvious hai na mam ye aise thodi na ki mere pass har waqt aata hai. Ab aap ticket close kar doge fir mujhe ticket reopen karna padega.
Executive: Koi baat nahi aap reopen kar dena mam usme koi dikkat nahi hai but mam aap bhi samajhne ki koshish kariye ya to aap wo videos mujhe share kar do abhi turant abhi mai karwa deti hu.
Customer: Mai turant kya mere hath me thodi na hai jab aayega tabhi to share karungi na koi aisa thodi na hai ki wo har waqt aise hi aata rehta hai. Aisa thodi na hai.
Executive: Nahi wo baat aapki bilkul thik hai but mere. Chaliye koi baat nahi to abhi mai ek minute aap call pe rahiye. Mam ek minute call pe rahiye.
Executive: Kya thi?
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Nahi.
Executive: Nahi kya tha na wo hai search ke bete ka birthday tha to shayad waha ke liye kuch khaya tha.
Executive: Ye to pata nahi tha unhone kuch.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji mam.
Executive: Hanji mam chaliye mai ek baar Ashwin sir se aage baat karke aati hu fir mai batati hu aapko uske bare me.
Customer: Thik hai mam.
Executive: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says the executive is delaying work.

- Customer needs recording line from CST tester.

- Customer is being manipulated; things are unclear.



Resolution:

- Executive will reopen ticket with Vasundhara mam.

- Executive will coordinate via WhatsApp for recording.

- Executive will discuss with Ashwin sir.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, recording, whatsapp, cst tester
